title: chewy mochi rice bars
ingredients: 2 Cups puffed brown rice (aka brown rice crisps)
instructions: Mix together flour, liquid, butter, salt, and syrup in a large microwave-safe bowl (large so we can mix in the rice and coconut later).
Microwave covered on high (1200W) for 1 minute.
Stir to finish melting the butter.
Cook again for 2 minutes on high.
Mix brown rice and coconut until evenly combined.
Place mixture on a buttered sheet pan or plain parchment paper in the desired shape. I like a rectangle that I can cut into 4 smaller rectangle bars (see photo on 1/4 pan).
notes: For a ride, I like to take a couple in a folded-over piece of parchment paper inside a Stasher bag.
